repairedDockerfile:
FROM ubuntu:trusty 

RUN apt-get update \  
&& apt-get upgrade -y \
&& apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y \
libgwenhywfar60-dev \
libaqbanking-dev \
python3 \
python3-pip \
aqbanking-tools \
&& rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*

RUN pip3 install --no-cache-dir python-aqbanking flask

RUN mkdir /app 
COPY app.py /app/app.py 

COPY entrypoint /bin/entrypoint 
RUN chmod +x /bin/entrypoint 

ENTRYPOINT ["/bin/entrypoint"] 

EXPOSE 80
